text.content: Hello ~name~. I'm glad you received my message. And you were able to find me out here. Come, kneel and meditate with me for a while.
I do have a pressing concern I wish to share with you. But first, let us collect ourselves. The night here is so very peaceful.
Okay, I didn't ask you to come here simply to meditate. I wanted to talk with you about a serious problem.
Ever since I was dragged to that poker game by Ken, my technique has been slipping. I can no longer focus. My punches are getting softer. My Hadouken is less potent.
The only thing I've ever truly cared about is fighting. I train every day, all day, with no rest. My training has made me forgo many things, including sexuality.

And I am perfectly happy with that. I don't care about things that get in the way of my training. I do not feel attraction to others. And I am certainly not ready to start a family yet, though perhaps some day.
Every night, I stay awake wondering "Why did Ken take me to that stupid, pointless card game, then leave me there?"
Maybe... it was to show me what I have been missing. Ken has a wife and son. He's had many girlfriends. I am still a virgin at my age.
The thought had never crossed my mind before, but now... in order to get my head back into my training... I think I need to reach a few new... milestones.
This isn't easy for me to ask but... ~name~, would you please be my first sexual experience?
At the card game, I sensed such a... strong, powerful Ki from you. I am attracted to you most of all.
Thank you. I don't know how to express my gratitude.
Please, just be gentle with me, okay?
